DOC.brief_summary: The study design evaluate increment serum 25 ( OH ) vitamin D level normal weight adolescent follow 12-week supplementation Vitamin D3 2000 IU/day .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Daily Vitamin D3 Supplementation Normal Weight Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty normal weight adolescent age 12-18 age gender would receive vitamin D3 supplementation dose 2000 IU/day . Levels 25 ( OH ) vitamin D would measure baseline 12 weeks.Relationship 25 OH vitamin D level demographic variable assessed.The primary endpoint study 25 OH Vitamin D level 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects age 12 18 year BMI 5th 85th percentile age gender . Subjects 25 ( OH ) D level > 80 ng/mL Serum calcium > 10.8 mg/dL Serum phosphorus > 5.5 mg/dl Pregnancy nursing Current cancer Patients multivitamin supplementation Dietary calcium intake exceed 1500 mg/day Hepatic renal disorder Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus Those receive insulin , metformin , oral hypoglycemic medication Malabsorption disorder ( Celiac disease , Cystic fibrosis , Inflammatory bowel disease )
